item.title: Alerting System (Audio/Visual) Courier/ Supernumerary Audio Alerting System – Compartment Remains Unoccupied

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided Courier/ Supernumerary compartment remains unoccupied.

note.para: Any audio alerting system function(s) that is operative may be used.

numlitem.para: The Courier/Supernumerary compartment must remain unoccupied.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel "SUPERNUM AUDIO ALERT SYS INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
